root_cause_pred: The root cause of the ZeroCostAlert was an attempt to broadcast a message promoting an item 'Sword of darkness' for '-10$', which is not allowed. Due to the system's constraint on negative broadcast values, it automatically rounded up the value to 0$ and attempted to resend the broadcast.
solution_pred: To prevent such alerts in the future, the system should be updated to validate broadcast message values before attempting to broadcast. Specifically, it should reject any broadcasts with negative values and log an error message, instead of attempting to adjust the value to 0$ and resending the message. This change will avoid triggering the ZeroCostAlert due to unintentionally promoted items for 0$.
